name: File Limits Uploads
author: Vijay Rathod

sections.description:
There is an increase in file upload size with this plugin.

With this plugin option, you can increase the file upload size easily.

Features

  • If you want to increase the size of the uploaded files, you can do so easily.
sections.installation:
Two Way to install

First Way – Via FTP.

1. Download plugin file and unzip it.
2. In the extracted folder you will find file-limits-uploads.zip file. Extract it.
3. Upload file-limits-uploads folder into Plugins folder in your WordPress installation (/wp-content/plugins) using an FTP client.
4. Log into your WordPress admin panel and click on the Plugins tab.
5. Find istalled plugin from the list and click Activate button.

Second Way – Via WordPress Dashboard.

1. Log into your WordPress admin panel and click on the Plugins tab.
2. Navigate to Add New > Upload
3. Click Choose File and select file-limits-uploads.zip file on your computer.
4. Then hit Install Now and the plugin will be uploaded and installed.
5. Than click Activate button.
